task_background: Prepare the IT maintenance room for an upcoming system audit by organizing tools, repairing equipment, and ensuring all documentation is properly stored.

tasks.task_description: Place the usb_sata_adapter_1 on the diagnostic_workbench_1.
Find the black ceramic mug with the inscription '#1 Sysadmin' and place it in the break_area.
Repair the broken problem_server_1 using the toolbox_1.
Use the screwdriver_set_1 to unscrew the raspberry_pi_1 and then repair it using the toolbox_1.
